title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer cannot log into their account despite entering the correct credentials. They attempted multiple password resets. The issue persists even after clearing cache and trying different devices.

title: Payment Failed
description: Customer reports their payment repeatedly fails during checkout. They have tried both debit and credit options. The billing address and card details were confirmed as correct.

title: Profile Update Error
description: The customer is unable to update their personal information in the account settings. The save button becomes unresponsive after changes are made. The issue occurs across both mobile and desktop.

title: App Crashing on Android
description: Customer reports the mobile app crashes when navigating to the account page. The issue was reproduced on two different Android devices. The application closes without showing any error message.

title: Feature Request - Dark Mode
description: Customer is requesting the addition of dark mode in the application. They believe it would improve usability at night. The request was submitted after comparing with competing applications.

title: Email Verification Not Working
description: Customer is unable to verify their email because no verification email is being received. They checked their spam and tried using a different address. The issue persists even after multiple attempts.

title: Incorrect Billing
description: Customer states they were mistakenly charged twice for the same subscription period. They provided screenshots of billing receipts. The duplicate charge has not been refunded automatically.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: The dashboard takes significantly longer than usual to load during peak hours. The user has tested on different internet connections. Other pages load normally, but the dashboard remains delayed.

title: Refund Request
description: Customer is requesting a refund after being charged post-cancellation. They submitted cancellation proof and billing records. The system did not recognize the cancellation request in time.

title: Notification Settings Issue
description: Customer changes notification settings but the updates are not being saved. They reported receiving emails even after disabling them. The issue occurs only in the email notification section.
